name: Dennis Rodman
expressionNote: Rodman should look CRAZY and intense, but NOT psychotic. Eyes should show mischief and wildness without being unnaturally wide open or deranged. Think 'unpredictable troublemaker' not 'horror movie villain'.

diving-loose-ball.name: Diving for Loose Ball
diving-loose-ball.description: Horizontal dive for loose ball - body completely parallel to ground, arms fully stretched reaching for ball
diving-loose-ball.prompt: horizontal dive for loose ball - body completely parallel to ground, arms fully stretched reaching for ball, wild pink hair flowing, intense focused eyes with mischievous grin - crazy but not psychotic

tipping-rebound.name: Tipping Rebound
tipping-rebound.description: Tipping a rebound at the apex - fingertips touching ball at highest point, body fully extended vertically
tipping-rebound.prompt: tipping a rebound at the apex - fingertips touching ball at highest point, body fully extended vertically, wild pink hair spiked up, fierce determination on face

defensive-stance-laughing.name: Defensive Stance Laughing
defensive-stance-laughing.description: Deep defensive stance, knees bent, arms wide, laughing on face
defensive-stance-laughing.expression: laughing with mischief, eyes showing amusement not madness
defensive-stance-laughing.prompt: deep defensive stance - knees bent low, arms spread wide for lockdown defense, laughing with pure mischief on face, eyes showing amusement and troublemaker energy - crazy but NOT psychotic, no wide-open deranged eyes

screaming-celebration.name: Screaming Celebration
screaming-celebration.description: Screaming celebration after ripping down a contested rebound
screaming-celebration.expression: primal scream of triumph, intense but not deranged
screaming-celebration.prompt: screaming celebration after contested rebound - ball clutched to chest, head thrown back in primal scream of triumph, pure raw emotion, eyes intense but not unnaturally wide - wild celebration not psychotic

laying-floor-smirking.name: Laying on Floor Smirking
laying-floor-smirking.description: Laying on the court floor casually, ball tucked under arm, smirking
laying-floor-smirking.prompt: laying casually on court floor - ball tucked under one arm, head propped on other hand, knowing smirk on face, wild pink hair, completely unbothered and in control
laying-floor-smirking.energy: I don't care attitude, cool chaos
